languages.text: "Многое из того, что узрели ваши глаза в членах моей свиты, оказалось печальной правдой".

traits.locale_text: "Многое из того, что узрели ваши глаза в членах моей свиты, оказалось печальной правдой".

languages.text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."
languages.original_text: "Многое из того, что узрели ваши глаза в членах моей свиты, оказалось печальной правдой".

traits.locale_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."
"Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."
"Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."
"Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."
"Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

languages.text: “你曾在我的随行人员身上看到过很多景象。令人难过的是，那些景象都变成了现实。”
languages.original_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

traits.locale_text: “你曾在我的随行人员身上看到过很多景象。令人难过的是，那些景象都变成了现实。”

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, mucho de lo que sus ojos vieron en mi séquito ha resultado ser cierto».
languages.original_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, mucho de lo que sus ojos vieron en mi séquito ha resultado ser cierto».

languages.text: 「かなしいことに、お前の目で私の随員に関して見たことの多くが真実だとわかった」
languages.original_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

traits.locale_text: 「かなしいことに、お前の目で私の随員に関して見たことの多くが真実だとわかった」

languages.text: "Bedauerlicherweise hat sich vieles als wahr erwiesen, was Eure Augen in den Mitgliedern meines Gefolges gesehen haben."
languages.original_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

traits.locale_text: "Bedauerlicherweise hat sich vieles als wahr erwiesen, was Eure Augen in den Mitgliedern meines Gefolges gesehen haben."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, presque tout ce que vous aviez dit sur les membres de mon entourage s'est confirmé. »
languages.original_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, presque tout ce que vous aviez dit sur les membres de mon entourage s'est confirmé. »

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki maiyetimdekiler hakkında gördüğün her şey doğru çıktı."
languages.original_text: "Sadly enough, a lot of what your eyes saw in members of my retinue has turned out to be true."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki maiyetimdekiler hakkında gördüğün her şey doğru çıktı."
